channel.title: I require assistance with actiontimers

item.title: I require assistance with actiontimers
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

Well this is mine, Donâ€™t know if it works for your server but heres one of mine

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client plr = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; plr.addSkillXP(1000, 18); }

Not with slayer levels though. I use it for my tzhaar minigame just added your npc id

item.title: I require assistance with actiontimers
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

How can I add it so you can only get slayer xp AFTER you kill the monster?
At the moment, people rapidly mass on the monsters and get a lot of xp.

if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1615) { if (playerLevel[18] >= 85) { slayer = true; actionTimer = 30; addSkillXP(6382, 18); } else { slayer = false; sendMessage( "You need a slayer level of 85 to attack abbysal demons."); } }

Read full topic
